roleset.name: gov't coopting private property, again
roleset.note: RENATIONALIZE-V NOTES: Roleset based on instances in BOLT-P01-3. Framed by Claire (from renationalize.01-v)

example.name: Args 0 & 1, alternate spelling
example.text: So , do you think that we should re-nationalise the railways and base the network on the French - German model of low fares and high quality ? I certainly do !
